component.name: RTT
component.description: Relay Terminal Tool - Multi-Agent Connection Fabric with Content-Addressed Storage and Deterministic Routing

components.name: rtt_dropin
components.description: Foundation layer: .rtt structure, panel.yaml, policy.json, routes.json, manifests, schemas

components.name: cas_vfs_starter
components.description: Content-Addressed Storage registry, view engine, pack/unpack, CAS tools

components.name: rtt_signed_plans_starter
components.description: Ed25519 signing infrastructure, plan signing/verification, key management

components.name: rtt_solver_constraints
components.description: Constraint solver with QoS awareness, semantic versioning, policy matching

components.name: rtt_placement_churn
components.description: NUMA-aware placement optimizer with churn minimization

components.name: rtt_exact_admission
components.description: Integer Linear Programming solver for exact admission control

components.name: rtt_elite_addon
components.description: Zero-config automation pipeline (00-50), agent bus, chaos engineering, CUE schemas, systemd service

components.name: rtt_mcp_ingest_signed_plans
components.description: Model Context Protocol integration, MCP tool ingestion, agent/skill registration, invariants checking

components.name: rtt_next_upgrades
components.description: Production components: native drivers (Rust/Go/Node/Python), shared memory fabric, native planner, native signers, ViewFS FUSE

components.name: universal_stubs
components.description: Multi-language connector stubs for 73 programming languages

components.name: rtt_mcp_dropin
components.description: MCP-to-RTT bridge, multi-provider support (claude, openai, mistral), provider management

components.name: mcp_opt_shims_bundle
components.description: Optimization shims, Kubernetes Gatekeeper Helm chart, policy enforcement, execution compatibility layer
